what: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
text: Sample MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data goal midfielddata provide sample MIDFIELD data practice working longitudinal, de-identified, individual student unit records.

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
text: MIDFIELD (June 2022) contains Student Unit Records (SURs) 1.7M undergraduates nineteen US institutions 1987 2018, though different institutions provide data different time spans. MIDFIELD large enough permit summarizing multiple characteristics race/ethnicity, sex, program. midfieldr R package provides tools working MIDFIELD research data practice data midfielddata R package. midfielddata R data package provides practice data (proportionate stratified sample MIDFIELD) longitudinal SURs nearly 98,000 undergraduates 12 institutions 1987–2016 organized four data tables:

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data
code: # Load the package library("midfielddata")  # Load individual data tables as needed data(student) data(term) data(course) data(degree)  # Alternatively, load several tables with one line data(student, term, degree)

title: Course data sample — course
text: Table course-related attributes approximately 96,000 undergraduates enrolled courses institutions. observation one course one term one student keyed student ID.

title: Course data sample — course
text: data.table approximately 3.4 M observations 12 variables occupying 340 MB memory: mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. term Character, academic year term, format YYYYT course Character, course name, e.g., Chemistry,       College Algebra, US History, etc. abbrev Character, course alpha identifier, e.g. ENGR, MATH, ENGL,       composite key (see id) number Character, course numeric identifier, e.g. 101, 3429,       composite key (see id) section Character, course section identifier, composite key       (see id) type Character, predominant delivery method section,       e.g., Blended, Honors, Lecture, Seminar, etc. faculty_rank Character, academic rank person teaching        course, e.g., Assistant Professor, Associate professor,        Graduate Assistant, Visiting, etc. hours_course Numeric, number credit-hours successful course        completion pass_fail Character, whether course offered pass/fail        basis, , Yes, missing grade Character, course grade, e.g., +, , -, B+, , NG, etc.

title: Course data sample — course
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project: https://midfield.online/

title: Course data sample — course
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students course table records student table admitted degree-seeking undergraduates degree table complete program. Terms encoded YYYYT, YYYY year Fall term starts academic year T = 1 (Fall), 2 (Winter, quarter systems ), 3 (Spring), 4 (Summer) 5 6 (Summer sessions 1 2). example, 1995--96 academic year, Fall '95 encoded 19951, Spring '96 encoded 19953, first summer '96 term encoded 19954. MIDFIELD research database also includes terms one month duration, encoded letters , B, C, etc., though none included sample.

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: Table degree-related attributes approximately 48,000 undergraduates upon completing programs. observation unique student keyed student ID.

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: data.table approximately 48,000 observations 5 variables occupying 10.2 MB memory. mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. term_degree Character, academic year term, format YYYYT,        student completes program cip6 Character, 6-digit CIP code program student        earns degree degree Character, type degree awarded, e.g., Bachelor's Degree,        Bachelor Arts, Bachelor Science, etc.

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project:         https://midfield.online/ CIP codes NCES IPEDS:         https://nces.ed.gov/ipeds/cipcode/

title: Degree data sample — degree
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students degree table also records student, course, term tables. Terms encoded YYYYT, YYYY year Fall term starts academic year T = 1 (Fall), 2 (Winter, quarter systems ), 3 (Spring), 4 (Summer) 5 6 (Summer sessions 1 2). example, 1995--96 academic year, Fall '95 encoded 19951, Spring '96 encoded 19953, first summer '96 term encoded 19954. MIDFIELD research database also includes terms one month duration, encoded letters , B, C, etc., though none included sample. program codes, midfielddata uses 2010 version Classification Instructional Programs (CIP) . See midfieldr cip information.

what: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data — midfielddata-package
title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data — midfielddata-package
text: Provides sample MIDFIELD data practice working longitudinal, de-identified, individual student unit records.

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data — midfielddata-package
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project: https://midfield.online/

title: Sample of MIDFIELD Student Unit Record Data — midfielddata-package
text: MIDFIELD contains individual Student Unit Record (SUR) data 1.7M students 21 US institutions (June 2022). MIDFIELD large enough permit grouping summarizing multiple characteristics, enabling researchers examine student characteristics (race/ethnicity, sex, prior achievement) curricular pathways (including coursework program) institution time. midfieldata provides sample data (practice) longitudinal SURs 98,000 undergraduates 12 institutions 1987–2016 organized four data tables: student course term degree Tools work data provided R package midfieldr.

title: Student data sample — student
text: Table attributes approximately 98,000 students upon admitted degree-seeking undergraduates. observation unique student keyed student ID.

title: Student data sample — student
text: data.table 97,640 observations 13 variables occupying 19 MB memory: mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. transfer Character, stating whether student First-Time   College students First-Time Transfer student hours_transfer Numeric, transfer hours accepted       institution race Character, race/ethnicity self-reported student,        e.g., Asian, Black, Latine, etc. sex Character, sex self-reported student, values       Female, Male, Unknown age Numeric, age admission self-reported student us_citizen Character, student US citizen? (Yes ) home_zip Character, five nine digit home ZIP code admission high_school Character, high school code last high       school attended entering post-secondary institution sat_math Numeric, SAT mathematics test score sat_verbal Numeric, SAT reading test score act_comp Numeric, ACT composite test score

title: Student data sample — student
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project: https://midfield.online/

title: Student data sample — student
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students student table typically appear also course term tables unless drop institution's drop date. appear degree table complete program.

title: Term data sample — term
text: Table term-related attributes approximately 94,000 undergraduates terms completed institutions. observation one term one student keyed student ID.

title: Term data sample — term
text: data.table approximately 711,000 observations 13 variables occupying 80 MB memory: mcid Character, anonymized student identifier institution Character, anonymized institution name, e.g.,       Institution , Institution B, etc. term Character, academic year term, format YYYYT cip6 Character, 6-digit CIP code program student       enrolled term level Character, 01 Freshman, 02 Sophomore, etc. standing Character, academic standing, e.g.,       Good Standing, Academic Suspension, etc. coop Character, cooperative education term, Yes hours_term Numeric, credit hours earned term hours_term_attempt Numeric, credit hours attempted term hours_cumul Numeric, cumulative credit hours earned hours_cumul_attempt Numeric, cumulative credit hours attempted gpa_term Numeric, term grade point average gpa_cumul Numeric, cumulative grade point average

title: Term data sample — term
text: Data provided MIDFIELD project:         https://midfield.online/ CIP codes NCES IPEDS:         https://nces.ed.gov/ipeds/cipcode/

title: Term data sample — term
text: data midfielddata proportionate stratified random sample 12 institutions MIDFIELD research database. However, practice data, research data---suitable learning student-record analysis, drawing inferences student performance. Students term table records student table admitted degree-seeking undergraduates degree table complete program. Terms encoded YYYYT, YYYY year Fall term starts academic year T = 1 (Fall), 2 (Winter, quarter systems ), 3 (Spring), 4 (Summer) 5 6 (Summer sessions 1 2). example, 1995--96 academic year, Fall '95 encoded 19951, Spring '96 encoded 19953, first summer '96 term encoded 19954. MIDFIELD research database also includes terms one month duration, encoded letters , B, C, etc., though none included sample. program codes, midfielddata uses 2010 version Classification Instructional Programs (CIP) . See midfieldr cip information.
